title: nrtyati nrtyati
sahitya:
nrtyati nrtyati sAmbashivO dhrkTa tOm dhrkTa tOm dhrkTa tOm dhrkTa tOm iti


caraNam 1    pAda shObhi maNi nUpura viracita bhAvuka khaNa khaNa raNitamuditamati 
rAdarENa purUhuta kalitavarahAri vENuruta lOla mauliriha
    caraNam 2    nandikEshvara suvAdi taDamaruga nandanIya Dumu Dumurava parasura 
sundarIkara vilOLita cAmara vrnda Esashi shusOma dharOpada
    caraNam 3    pApahIna muni sEvita padayuga padmanAbha sahajApatira sharaNa 
tApa dAraNa parOyama nindita dhanya shIla nivahOgiri shObahu
